FuncDef: This command configures the hashing algorithm used to calculate the message digest. Thedefaultparameter only applies in theconfig>router>l2tp>group>l2tpv3context.

ParaDef.Info: In the config>router>l2tp>group>l2tpv3, this parameter references the digest type configured in the config>router>l2tp>l2tpv3 context.
Specifies that no digest should be used.
Specifies that the MD5 algorithm should be used.
Specifies that the SHA1 algorithm should be used.
